name: Get Dis Money
description: A game about gangsterz in space getting money. Arcade style, 2d rougelike action platformer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit Processor: 1.5Ghz dual-core Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Open GL 3.1+ Compliant Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: If you like 8-bit noises then yes
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: 2.0Ghz dual-core Intel Core i5 or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 600 series with 2GB memory or higher Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: If you like 8-bit noises then yes
